title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terror Targets in Southern Lebanon: Key Details from Latest Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked Hezbollah terror targets in southern Lebanon

Fighter jets attacked last night (Tue.) a military structure and a terrorist infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Mizra’at Akmahta area in southern Lebanon. In addition, IDF forces conducted shooting to remove threats in the Wadi Kateya area earlier today.

Following warnings about the penetration of aircraft, a number of suspected aerial targets were identified, air defense fighters successfully intercepted one of the targets.
Another suspected target fell in the Yiftach area, causing a fire in that place. Two targets fell in an open area, the rest of the targets fell and caused minor damage. No injuries were reported.
